title: Case report: Varicella zoster virus encephalitis following COVID-19 vaccination in an immunocompetent individual
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Sanaz Rezaeian, Fatemeh Rahmanian, Zohre Rajabpour, Ali Taghipour, Mirza Ali Mofazzal Jahromi, Abdolvahab Rahmanian, Heshmatollah Shakeri, Navid Kalani, Maryam Jalali Jahromi, Amir Abdoli
